tasks.description: Investigate and resolve the authentication issue where users occasionally get logged out unexpectedly. Check the token expiration flow, session storage handling, and ensure the backend returns proper status codes to prevent sudden logout errors.

Revise the existing marketing materials based on the new branding guidelines. Update the color palette, typography, and layout. Ensure consistency across brochures, social media templates, banners, and promotional graphics.

Review slow database queries reported in the analytics dashboard. Identify bottlenecks, add proper indexing, and refactor inefficient join operations. Test performance improvements using real-time requests and load-testing tools.

Draft and submit the new project proposal including objectives, requirements, estimated timeline, and projected budget. Coordinate with the design and development teams to ensure all technical details are consistent and feasible.
